metadata.name: Overwhelming Wonder
metadata.description:
A year ago, my Mum lost her battle to cancer.  
I made this piece during the anniversary of her passing and found great comfort in the creative process.  
While drawing, I was thinking about life, death and the cyclic nature of all things.  
Despite being created during a time of sad memories, it's my intention that this piece radiates warmth and positivity. Ultimately, the artwork is about change. It's a celebration of the immense beauty of this magical little adventure we call life.

3500 X 4590 px  
1/1 hand drawn, mixed media illustration  
The genesis piece of this collection  
Rik Lee 2023
